title: It's You
description: A declaration of love that he fails to deal with both emotionally and professionally catapults Mark into a spiral of deceit and decline. His career, imminent marriage, friends, his belief in himself, implode.The opinions of an ambitious headmaster, a best friend, jealous lovers, errant parents, a failed businessmen, a Brazilian taxi driver and a handsome backpacker all surprise and confound him over his love for Mark. Will he ever come to his senses?
author: D. Bunyan
